text: wherever I've gone and I've been here in
Manila down to Tacloban where he was
yesterday now back here in Manila the
thing people are saying is the same this
hope is someone who touches people he
reaches out to the poor and the
dispossessed of which there are many
many in in in the Philippines and people
have described him as not just a people
spoke but a pope for the poor and that's
very very important in this country
where a quarter of the population live
below the poverty line and you can see
the enthusiasm just the numbers of
people who turned out wherever he has
been there were hundreds of thousands in
Tacloban yesterday despite the terrible
terrible weather and the weather is not
good here in Manila either today raining
again but millions of people flown out
to see him at this mass today to
celebrate his happiness here
